Style/CaseEquality.description:
Description

Avoid explicit use of the case equality operator (`===`).
Style/CaseEquality.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

References: ['https://docs.rubocop.org/rubocop-performance/cops_performance.html#performanceregexpmatch'] (type: list)
AllowOnConstant: False (type: bool)
AllowOnSelfClass: False (type: bool)
